title: Tequila (1973, Spaghetti Western) by Tulio Demicheli | Anthony Steffen, Roberto Camardiel | Movie

sources.title: Tequila (1973, Spaghetti Western) by Tulio Demicheli | Anthony Steffen, Roberto Camardiel | Movie
sources.description:
Anthony Steffen is Shoshena, a fast gun with a $5,000 bounty on his head.
In a ghost town ruse to outsmart bounty hunters, the cunning Shoshena orchestrates a deadly game of deception, leading to an unexpected encounter with a man named Fuzzy, mistaken for the notorious Jaquar. As they join forces to plan a bank heist in Chedron, they encounter the oppressive DeKovan family, aiming to drive out small ranchers and manipulate the damsel in distress, entangling themselves in a web of treachery, romance, and high-stakes thievery in the Wild West.

Original title: Uno, dos, tres... dispara otra vez (1973) AKA: Fuzzy the Hero

This film has English & Italian audio, and subtitles in many languages.

Director: Tulio Demicheli
Writers: Miguel Iglesias, Enrique Josa, Nino Stresa
Genres: Italian cinema, Comedy, Western, Spaghetti Western.

Main Cast:
Anthony Steffen as Shoshena
Eduardo Fajardo as Cogan
Roberto Camardiel as Fuzzy/Jaguar
Ágata Lys as Ingrid Cogan
María Elena Arpón as Beatrice Rush
Mirko Ellis as Compton
John Bartha as the sheriff
José Luis Zalde as Rush


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
07:32 Shoshena masterminds a daring bank robbery in the dusty frontier town.
18:45 The mysterious stranger claims to be Jaguar while confronting the Sampson gang.
32:16 Shoshena discovers the truth about the stolen money hidden by Decovan.
45:53 The Sampson brothers ambush Jaguar at the abandoned silver mine.
59:24 Shoshena and Jaguar forge an uneasy alliance against the Sampson family.
1:12:38 Sheriff Matthews reveals his secret connection to the stolen bank money.
1:25:47 Jaguar faces off against the Sampson brothers in a dramatic showdown.
